trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_SEQ_00<tab>Kokkol Dankkol is, as usual, worked up over the aetherburner.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_TODO_00<tab>Wait at the destination.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Fourchenault at Aporia.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Clarilaine.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Fourchenault.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_TODO_05<tab>Proceed to the entrance of Thaumazein.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Fourchenault.

TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_GRAHATIA_000_000<tab>I did thoroughly brief Kokkol on refined adamantite's history. I only volunteered to go to the reactor because I had finished and there was little else to do.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_GRAHATIA_000_001<tab>Hopefully that dispels any misapprehensions that I was kicked out for prattling on...
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_KOKKOLDANKKOL_000_010<tab><sigh> I do trust you to deliver on your promise, I do. Only...
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_KOKKOLDANKKOL_000_011<tab>I hate waitin'! I want that adamantite, and I want it <var 1A 02 /var>now<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_GRAHATIA_000_012<tab>We...er, share your impatience, I assure you. Is there truly nothing else we can assist with in the meantime?
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_KOKKOLDANKKOL_000_013<tab>I wish! This sittin' about's unbearable. Pity the Forum frowns on recreational explosions...
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_KOKKOLDANKKOL_000_014<tab>Well, so long as they can't prove it was premeditated. Get you gone─I've mistakes to make!

TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_GRAHATIA_000_015<tab>...In that case, I suppose I should go and return the key to the reactor. I'll have one more look to make sure that nothing has gone wrong. Unintentionally or otherwise.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_GRAHATIA_000_016<tab>I'm certain there are better uses for <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> time, however. I will join you in Sharlayan Hamlet anon!
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_KOKKOLDANKKOL_000_020<tab>Any smoke risin' from the building behind me will be entirely unrelated to what I <var 1A 02 /var>didn't<var 1A 01 /var> say, got it?
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>If you wait here, your companions are bound to turn up sooner or later...
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_Q1_000_031<tab>Await your companions?

TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_ALISAIE_000_040<tab>I had no idea how massive a weight it was until he lifted it off my shoulders... But more importantly, his words were an affirmation that the path we walk is the right one.

TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_ALISAIE_000_041<tab>A part of me might have been satisfied so long as my family and friends survived the Final Days. But to save this star is what we <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> want most, and if those same people believe that I can help see it done, who am I to say otherwise?
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_ALISAIE_000_042<tab>Come what may, I will fight for this world of ours until the very end.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_THANCRED_000_045<tab>If I never see another crate again, it will be too soon.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_URIANGER_000_050<tab>Unaided, we Scions could never have gathered such a bounty. Refined adamantite, relics sacred and ancient alike...
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_URIANGER_000_051<tab>I find myself quite overcome.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_YSHTOLA_000_055<tab>Lyse sent a letter along with Gridania's contribution. It seems she traveled there to aid in their adamantite recovery.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_YSHTOLA_000_056<tab>Evidently, journeying to Gridania was quite the trial. As was getting into the Dalamud shard. As was reaching its depths...
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_YSHTOLA_000_057<tab>I suspect she will have few kind words to say about the Allagans when next we meet.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_GRAHATIA_000_060<tab>I cannot wait to see what our friends from the Ironworks do with the ship!
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_ESTINIEN_000_065<tab>The time has come to claim our prize. Are you prepared?
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_KRILE_000_070<tab>I apologize for not informing you earlier of Erenville's involvement. He was something of a contingency plan.

TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_KRILE_000_071<tab>Thank goodness we had him and his fellow gleaners to hand, though. It would have been monstrously difficult to locate Cid and transport the Hannish delegation here otherwise...
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_TATARU_000_075<tab><cough> My throat hurts from directing so many people to Labyrinthos...but that only proves we got our money's worth!
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_ALPHINAUD_000_080<tab>We've finally managed to clear the harbor, which means the rest is in the engineers' capable hands.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_ALPHINAUD_000_081<tab>Meanwhile, Father has issued to us an invitation.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_ALPHINAUD_000_082<tab>As was agreed, he will reveal the means by which Hydaelyn may be contacted.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_ALPHINAUD_000_083<tab>We are to meet him at Aporia when we're ready. Given the vital knowledge She holds, I suggest we leave without delay.

TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_ALPHINAUD_000_084<tab>It transpires, however, that the Forum's method for speaking with Her is not without risks. I am curious to hear what those might entail─but regardless, be warned.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_TATARU_000_085<tab>Most of those who arrived with the adamantite have offered to stay and see to any remaining tasks that need doing.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_TATARU_000_086<tab>The Forum has already asked for my assistance in overseeing the process, so you needn't worry about a thing!
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_ALPHINAUD_000_087<tab>Thank you, Tataru. We're off to Aporia, then!

TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_TATARU_000_090<tab>I don't want any of you getting hurt─but I do hope you'll wring as much information out of Hydaelyn as you can. For all we know, this is the one and only opportunity we'll get.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_FOURCHENAULT_000_100<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I have already shown the others inside.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_FOURCHENAULT_000_101<tab>You will want to speak with Clarilaine. She has the key to the lift, and can send you down after me.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_CLARILAINE_000_110<tab>You're with Master Fourchenault, yes? Just step inside the lift here.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_Q2_000_111<tab>Descend to the lower levels?
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_CLARILAINE_000_120<tab>You are welcome to use the lift whenever you like.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_FOURCHENAULT_000_130<tab>From here, we proceed to the heart of Labyrinthos, and its most closely guarded secret─Thaumazein.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_FOURCHENAULT_000_131<tab>It marks the beginning and end of our efforts─whence we delved to seek audience with the star, and whence we will embark on our journey to the heavens.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_FOURCHENAULT_000_132<tab>This way, if you please.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_FOURCHENAULT_000_140<tab>I bid you welcome to Thaumazein. Direct your attention toward its center to behold the ark over which we have long labored.

TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_FOURCHENAULT_000_141<tab>As you can see, 'twas designed as a medium-sized craft, the better to reduce fuel consumption. Miniaturizing magicks have been applied to its interior to ensure that the thrust-to-weight ratio does not place too great a limitation on its freight capacity.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_FOURCHENAULT_000_142<tab>The aetherburner, as you know, has been removed for further modification, but we shall reattach it soon enough.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_FOURCHENAULT_000_143<tab>I have received word that Kokkol and several of your allies are working on it with an intense fervor.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_ALPHINAUD_000_144<tab>They are sure to see it done. 'Twas by their expertise that many a prior disaster was averted.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_ALPHINAUD_000_145<tab>If anything, I fear they will not afford us much time for speaking with Hydaelyn ere they finish...
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_FOURCHENAULT_000_146<tab>Point taken. Let us move on. I must warn you again, however, that even with the benefit of our device, to treat with Her is not a simple feat.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_ALPHINAUD_000_150<tab>To think how many generations labored for this end...and that we aim higher still.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_ALPHINAUD_000_151<tab>We must spare no preparation─and that means speaking with Hydaelyn, no matter the cost.

TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_ALISAIE_000_155<tab>I can well imagine the zeal with which they're working on the aetherburner, and all I can say is that I'm glad we have something to do other than get in their way.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_ALISAIE_000_156<tab>Once it's ready, we'll see to it that the ship is put to good use!

TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_THANCRED_000_160<tab>I doubt this is what Erenville meant when he said that there remains much we do not know, but I still can't believe everything that was hidden underneath the city this entire time.

TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_URIANGER_000_165<tab>'Twould seem enchantments most advanced have been woven into the ship's very bones. Wilfsunn and Bloewyda were doubtless called upon for their expertise in teleportation magicks...
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_YSHTOLA_000_170<tab>We must learn of Hydaelyn's greater plan. We can only hope that She also knows the current location of Meteion...
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_YSHTOLA_000_171<tab>...And we can do neither if we do not focus on whatever trial awaits us within.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_GRAHATIA_000_175<tab>It was the Allagans who first combined the mechanical and aetherial sciences into a revolutionary discipline.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_GRAHATIA_000_176<tab>Given that this ship is nothing short of a technological marvel in that precise vein, Allagan salvage should suit it well.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_ESTINIEN_000_180<tab>You feel it too, don't you? The ship is impressive, but it pales in comparison to the vast primordial power beneath our feet...
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_KRILE_000_185<tab>If meeting Hydaelyn proves difficult even for the Forum, then perhaps I─
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_KRILE_000_186<tab>Oh, 'tis an unformed idea at this phase, I'm afraid. I will duly inform you if anything comes of it.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_FOURCHENAULT_000_190<tab>I have done what I can to impress upon you the gravity of what lies ahead.
TEXT_AKTKMF110_04448_FOURCHENAULT_000_191<tab>Are you prepared?
